title: Validation of a food frequency questionnaire for measuring dietary intake of isoflavones and lignans using the method of triads.
abstract: Emerging epidemiologic evidence suggested a protective association between dietary phytoestrogens and multiple chronic diseases, although validation studies on the 2 phytoestrogen subclasses, isoflavones and lignans, estimated from food frequency questionnaires (FFQs) are lacking.
journal: The American journal of clinical nutrition
